name: 12-Gauge Obsidian Shell
description: 12-Gauge Obsidian Shells are a variant of12-Gauge Buckshot Shellsthat deal fire damage on hit and have a chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Although it may have a low percent chance of setting targets on fire, 12-Gauge Obsidian Shells can decimate Fauna that have a weakness to fire, especially when the 'Burning' modifier occurs. A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewedhere.
